overview: In family which lives in richness and luxury, treachery and destruction - things in the order of day. To evade from melancholy and in leisure often it left in infringement but... In one day the daily standard subroutine is interrupted by a finding of a corpse. Who has killed beautiful, wife of the rich husband?? The representative of police is involved in investigations, prosecutions. All have alibi and a case becomes more and more complex.
title: Delitto Imperfetto
